meanings.sent1: The barnwoods were repurposed to build a new fence.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter crafted a beautiful table from the barnwoods.
meanings.sent3: The barnwoods told stories of the old farm to anyone who listened.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like barnwoods, weathered by time but full of history.
meanings.sent5: The scent of barnwoods filled the room, bringing memories of the countryside.

meanings.definition: The weathered boards used in rustic decor.
meanings.sent1: She decorated her living room with charming barnwoods.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant had a cozy atmosphere with barnwoods on the walls.
meanings.sent3: The barnwoods whispered tales of the past to the modern furniture.
meanings.sent4: His voice had the roughness of barnwoods, deep and textured.
meanings.sent5: The barnwoods added a touch of history and warmth to the cabin.
